subject: Steroids
Tests and Testing
lead_paragraph: Marion Jones has been included on the United States team for this weekend’s I.A.A.F. World Cup in Athens. Jones has not confirmed her participation, USA Track & Field said in a statement yesterday, but her manager, Charles Wells, said she planned to compete in the 100 meters. Jones was cleared of doping last week after her B sample tested negative for the banned blood-boosting drug EPO.
